findings.description: CORS misconfiguration on WordPress REST API endpoint allowing arbitrary origins with credentials enables cross-site requests to access potentially sensitive page data and perform authenticated actions.
findings.exploitation_steps: Create malicious webpage that makes XMLHttpRequest to https://www.plex.tv/wp-json/wp/v2/pages/20856 with credentials, allowing extraction of page content and potentially making authenticated API calls if user is logged into Plex.
